EmailTemplate.subject: Sign up for Birmingham Ignite!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Your first Challenge Society event is here with Ignite Birmingham. Ignite your future learning from a top BBC professional and discovering what an employer wants from you, as well as reuniting with your wave.
Saturday 29th November Birmingham City Centre 1:00pm-5:00pm
If you have already signed up to an Ignite London event, please cancel your tickets and sign up for the Birmingham event.
Sign up here! But be quick, tickets are limited! www.ignitebirmingham2014.eventbrite.co.uk
